entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 21. POP 60%
